hero.title: Get Started with MyApp
hero.description: Follow these simple steps to begin building your application with MyApp. Our streamlined setup process will have you up and running in minutes.

install.title: Install Dependencies
install.description: Begin by installing all required dependencies for your project.

configure.title: Configure Your Project
configure.description: Set up your project configuration with our simple setup wizard.

create.title: Create Your First Component
create.description: Start building by creating your first component.

nextSteps.title: Next Steps
nextSteps.description: Now that you've set up your project, explore our resources to learn more:

help.title: Need Help?
help.description: If you run into any issues or need assistance, our community is here to help:
